route_depth.description: Average distance from line of scrimmage where route cut occurs
route_depth.data_source: NFLfastR (2025 season data not yet published)
route_depth.note: Available for 2024 and earlier - will enable when 2025 data available

route_win_rate.description: Percentage of routes where WR created separation
route_win_rate.note: Not available in NFLfastR - use observation only

yards_per_route_run.description: Efficiency metric independent of target share

success_rate.calculation: COUNT(success=1) / COUNT(*) WHERE rusher_player_id = ? OR receiver_player_id = ?
success_rate.description: Play gained required percentage of yards by down (40% on 1st, 60% on 2nd, 100% on 3rd/4th)
success_rate.data_source: NFLfastR (2025 season data not yet published)

yards_before_contact.description: Yards gained before first defender contact
yards_before_contact.data_source: NFLfastR (2025 season data not yet published)
yards_before_contact.note: yards_after_contact available in NFLfastR for 2024 and earlier

red_zone_snap_rate.calculation: COUNT(*) WHERE yardline_100 <= 20 AND player_on_field / total_rz_snaps
red_zone_snap_rate.description: Percentage of team red zone snaps player was on field
red_zone_snap_rate.data_source: NFLfastR (2025 season data not yet published)

target_rate_per_route.description: How often QB targets player when they run route

chunk_yardage_rate.description: Percentage of runs hitting yardage thresholds (10+, 15+, 20+, 30+)
chunk_yardage_rate.data_source: NFLfastR (2025 season data not yet published)

yptpa.description: Yards Per Team Pass Attempt - efficiency independent of target share
yptpa.data_source: NFLfastR (2025 season data not yet published)

dropback_rate_while_trailing.description: How often team passes when behind (game script indicator)
dropback_rate_while_trailing.data_source: NFLfastR (2025 season data not yet published)

target_share_to_rb_te.description: What percentage of targets go to RB/TE vs WR
target_share_to_rb_te.data_source: NFLfastR (2025 season data not yet published)

snap_share.description: Percentage of team snaps player was on field

yards_per_carry.description: Average yards gained per rushing attempt
yards_per_carry.data_source: NFLfastR (2025 season data not yet published)
yards_per_carry.note: Available for historical seasons (2024 and earlier) only

touches_per_game.description: Combined carries and targets per game

target_share.description: Percentage of team targets directed to player
target_share.data_source: NFLfastR (2025 season data not yet published)

route_participation.description: Percentage of pass plays where player ran route
route_participation.note: Not available in NFLfastR or current system
